Key Match Events: Travis d’Arnaud hit a walk-off homer in the ninth inning
Post-Match Reflections: The Braves moved one game ahead of the New York Mets and Arizona Diamondbacks in the race for the final two NL wild-card spots
Miscellaneous Highlights: Raisel Iglesias (6-2) earned the win with a perfect top half of the ninth
Others: Reynaldo López came off the injured list to throw six strong innings for the Braves
Kansas City went ahead in the third after starting the frame with its only two hits off Lopez
Sixteen-game winner Seth Lugo pitched two scoreless innings for Kansas City
